item.title: Click here to view my disintegration as I attempt to explain R and Python
item.description: Hello there and Welcome. I am going to attempt to demonstrate the extend of my coding skills below. Prepare to be blown away. (Only if there's a monstrous wind blowing and you're sitting outside. If not, the threat is completely bogus and you can ignore it.) Here we have a code chunk in R, a programming language, which is essentially a way to communicate with the computer(for my non-computer science friends out there-- I was you recently, or still am?

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.
